title: EastEnders spoilers: Martin in serious danger but will he die?
text:
Martin Fowler (James Bye) has been at the beck and call of Ben Mitchell (Max Bowden) in EastEnders over the last few weeks, and he’s not too pleased about it. However, he’s determined to get the Mitchell lad out his life in the coming episodes, but — upon taking drastic action to do so — he finds himself in serious danger. Could this be the end for Martin?

Unable to keep his alliance with Ben a secret any longer, Martin confides in Kush about everything that’s transpired over the last couple of weeks. Kush is horrified at his mate’s revelation, and he demands that they confront Ben together. However, upon doing so, Ben makes it clear that he’s not backing down — and Martin comes up with a plan as a result.

The fruit-and-veg stall holder goes to Jack (Scott Maslen) and proceeds to speak to him about a ‘friend’ who’s in trouble.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Later in the week, Martin makes a promise to Bex that he’ll spend time with her, but Ben throws a spanner in his plans when he demands Martin take part in another job. However, Tubbs is soon arrested — and Jack watches on.

With Tubbs in custody — Martin manages to persuade Ben to do the job with him. From his actions, it’s clear that Martin has a plan to get revenge on Ben — but the question is: what exactly is it?

Afterwards, Martin’s relieved, as he believes that everything with Ben is finally in the past, but Ben ends up going to extreme lengths to prove otherwise — highlighting that he’s not to be messed with.

As a result, Martin finds himself in terrible danger.

Is this is the end of the Walford legend?

Will he die as a result of Ben’s actions?

One to watch: Friday 25th October at 8pm on BBC One.
